data.fullContent: Jessica was an avid gardener, and one of her favorite plants was petunias. She loved to buy colorful, fresh petunias at the local nursery every year. She had planted them in her garden in the spring. When summer came, she noticed that the petunias were thriving. The warm weather caused the flowers to grow outward and in size. She wondered if the hot weather would cause the petunias to stop blooming. As the days grew warmer, Jess noticed that the petunias were even more beautiful than before. She realized that having a large, colorful, healthy garden was a great source of happiness for her.

q1.translation: 杰西卡是一个狂热的园丁，她最喜欢的植物之一是牵牛花。她喜欢每年都去当地的苗圃买色彩鲜艳的新鲜牵牛花。她是春天把它们种在花园里的。夏天来了，她注意到矮牵牛花正在茁壮成长。温暖的天气使花儿向外生长，个头越来越大。
q1.front: Jessica was an avid gardener, and one of her favorite plants was petunias. She loved to buy colorful, fresh petunias at the local nursery every year. She had planted them in her garden in the spring. When summer came, she noticed that the petunias were thriving. The warm weather caused the flowers to grow outward and in size.
q1.content: Jessica was an avid ____, and one of her ____ plants ____ petunias. She loved to buy colorful, fresh petunias at the local nursery every ____. She had planted ____ in her garden in the spring. When summer came, she noticed that the petunias were thriving. The warm weather caused the flowers to ____ outward and in size.

q2.translation: 杰西卡是一个狂热的园丁，她最喜欢的植物之一是牵牛花。她喜欢每年都去当地的苗圃买色彩鲜艳的新鲜牵牛花。她是春天把它们种在花园里的。夏天来了，她注意到矮牵牛花正在茁壮成长。温暖的天气使花儿向外生长，个头越来越大。她想知道炎热的天气是否会使牵牛花停止开花。随着天气越来越暖和，杰西注意到牵牛花比以前更漂亮了。她意识到拥有一个大的、五颜六色的、健康的花园对她来说是快乐的源泉。
q2.front: Jessica was an avid gardener, and one of her favorite plants was petunias. She loved to buy colorful, fresh petunias at the local nursery every year. She had planted them in her garden in the spring. When summer came, she noticed that the petunias were thriving. The warm weather caused the flowers to grow outward and in size.
q2.middle: She wondered if the hot weather would cause the petunias to stop blooming.
q2.ending: As the days grew warmer, Jess noticed that the petunias were even more beautiful than before. She realized that having a large, colorful, healthy garden was a great source of happiness for her.

She wondered if the hot weather would cause the petunias to stop blooming.

q3.selectAnswer: she noticed that the petunias were thriving

options.sentence: Jess had planted petunia seeds, but none had sprouted.
Jessica was an avid gardener who loved to grow petunias.
Jessica and her best friend decided to start their own garden.
Jessica then went home and searched online for plant seeds.
